name: resources-localization
description: Guidance for .NET resource files (.resx) and IStringLocalizer-based localization. USE FOR: .resx resource file management, IStringLocalizer and IStringLocalizerFactory usage, strongly-typed resource access, satellite assembly localization. DO NOT USE FOR: culture-aware number/date formatting (use globalization-localization), ICU plural/gender patterns (use messageformat-net), full i18n architecture (use i18n).
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick

references.title: Globalization and Localization in ASP.NET Core
